name: Ecliptic Firefight
description:
Ecliptic Firefight is a simplistic top down retro styled shooter with strategic fast paced battles!

It Includes:

  • A level mode sure to keep you entertained!

  • Randomized mode with completely random enemies mixed and matched to give you a unique gameplay experience!

  • 12 tough as nails bonus levels!

Extra:

The game will be updated over time to fix bugs and potentially some changes to the game play. We really want to hear people's opinions about the game so we can improve it for the future!

Creators:

Evan Samuel - https://twitter.com/lilbudgotswag
